timeline.message: Move ProgressTests to Kotlin source set
Automatic convertion of ProgressTests to Kotlin

timeline.bodyText: Nitpick. I kinda liked the old formatting where you could see the matrix 😉

+package io.realm
+
+import androidx.test.ext.junit.runners.AndroidJUnit4
+import org.junit.Assert.assertEquals
+import org.junit.Test
+import org.junit.runner.RunWith
+import java.util.*
+
+@RunWith(AndroidJUnit4::class)
+class ProgressTests {
+
+    @Test
+    fun getFractionTransferred () {
+        val testData = arrayOf(arrayOf<Any>(0L, 0L, 1.0), arrayOf<Any>(0L, 1L, 0.0), arrayOf<Any>(1L, 1L, 1.0), arrayOf<Any>(1L, 2L, 0.5))
